00003 #ifndef _ORVBasicADCDecoder_hh_
00004 #define _ORVBasicADCDecoder_hh_

00006 #include "ORVBasicRDTreeDecoder.hh"
00007 #include "ORVHistDecoder.hh"
00008 #include "ORVEventCounterDecoder.hh"

00010 class ORVBasicADCDecoder : public ORVHistDecoder, public ORVBasicRDTreeDecoder, public ORVEventCounterDecoder
00011 {
00012   public:
00013     ORVBasicADCDecoder() {}
00014     virtual ~ORVBasicADCDecoder() {}
00015 
00016     virtual void Swap(UInt_t* dataRecord);
00017     /* Handling the correct swapping for this record. */
00018     virtual inline UInt_t ChannelOf(UInt_t* record)
00019       { return IsShort(record) ? (record[0] & 0x0000f000) >> 12 : (record[1] & 0x0000f000) >> 12; }
00020     virtual inline UInt_t ADCValueOf(UInt_t* record)
00021       { return IsShort(record) ? (record[0] & 0x00000fff) : (record[1] & 0x00000fff); }
00022     virtual double ReferenceDateOf(UInt_t* record);
00023 
00024     // for histograms
00025     virtual std::string GetHistName(int iHist);
00026     virtual std::string GetHistTitle(int iHist);
00027     virtual inline std::string GetXTitle() { return "ADC Value"; }
00028     virtual inline size_t GetNbinsX() { return 0xfff+1; }
00029     virtual inline double GetXLo() { return -0.5; }
00030     virtual inline double GetXHi() { return double(0xfff) + 0.5; }
00031 
00032     virtual int GetHistIndex(UInt_t* record);
00033     virtual inline double GetX(UInt_t* record, size_t /*i*/) { return double(ADCValueOf(record)); }
00034 
00035     // for basic trees
00036     virtual inline size_t GetNPars() { return 4; }
00037     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00038     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/);
00039 
00040     // for event counters
00041     virtual inline size_t GetEventCount(UInt_t* /*record*/) { return 1; }
00042 
00043     virtual std::string GetLabel() = 0;
00044     virtual inline size_t GetNChannelsMax() { return 0xf+1; }
00045 };

00047 #endif
